Text: I'm getting really slow d/l rates right now (>10 kbps) but im gonna leave this on all night and once i get it, I promise I will seed like a whore, because this season is EPIC!

Everyone please check your settings, if speed is slow - 100 seeds should be enough for fast download, and also seed as hell when you got this!

Just finished the season and I got to say, although I had to grow custom to Matt Smith as the doctor in season 5 he really made it up to me through season 5 and definitely season 6!
How wonderful a doctor's companion IS able to find true love besides the doctor :D ...
And Karen Gilla is sexy as hell - Arrrrrr!

I agree with godfate: This season is EPIC!
